ivardefs.name: accessionIdentifier
ivardefs.desc: The identifier assigned by the lab when accessioning specimen(s). This is not necessarily the same as the specimen identifier, depending on local lab procedures.

ivardefs.name: condition_
ivardefs.desc: A mode or state of being that describes the nature of the specimen.

ivardefs.name: container_
ivardefs.desc: The container holding the specimen.  The recursive nature of containers; i.e. blood in tube in tray in rack is not addressed here.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: To communicate any details or issues about the specimen or during the specimen collection. (for example: broken vial, sent with patient, frozen).

ivardefs.name: parent_
ivardefs.desc: Reference to the parent (source) specimen which is used when the specimen was either derived from or a component of another specimen.

ivardefs.name: processing_
ivardefs.desc: Details concerning processing and processing steps for the specimen.

ivardefs.name: receivedTime
ivardefs.desc: Time when specimen was received for processing or testing.

ivardefs.name: request_
ivardefs.desc: Details concerning a service request that required a specimen to be collected.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: Where the specimen came from. This may be from patient(s), from a location (e.g., the source of an environmental sample), or a sampling of a substance or a device.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The kind of material that forms the specimen.

properties.desc: A sample to be used for analysis.
